articles.content:
BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICAA PROCLAMATION
Today, I am very honored to recognize February 9, 2025, as the first ever Gulf of America Day.
     On January 20, 2025, I signed Exec… [+1670 chars]
